alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Dubuque; Jackson (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 8:49AM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Jo Daviess, Stephenson, north central Jackson, Dubuque and southeastern Delaware Counties through 930 AM CST... At 849 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Byron to Freeport to near Elizabeth to near Worthington. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dubuque, Freeport, Galena, Asbury, Dyersville, Lena, Stockton, Epworth, East Dubuque, Farley, Warren, Peosta, Pearl City, Elizabeth, Cedarville, Davis, Woodbine, Dakota, German Valley and Worthington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
